products.title: Classic Denim Jacket
products.description: Timeless denim jacket with a relaxed fit and button closures.
products.detailedDescription: Crafted from premium 12-ounce denim, this jacket features a classic trucker silhouette with a slightly relaxed fit for comfort. The durable metal buttons and reinforced stitching ensure long-lasting wear. Perfect for layering in spring or fall. Machine washable with minimal shrinkage.

products.title: Slim Fit Chinos
products.description: Comfortable slim fit chinos for casual and formal wear.
products.detailedDescription: These versatile chinos feature a modern slim fit through the seat and thigh with a tapered leg. Made from stretch cotton twill for all-day comfort. The hidden zip fly and button closure provide a clean look. Ideal for both office wear and weekend outings.

products.title: Cotton Graphic T-Shirt
products.description: Soft cotton t-shirt with a bold front graphic.
products.detailedDescription: This lightweight tee is made from 100% combed cotton for exceptional softness. The vibrant graphic print is screen-printed for durability. Features a classic crew neck and short sleeves. Pre-shrunk fabric maintains shape after washing.

products.title: Women's Trench Coat
products.description: Elegant long trench coat with belted waist and classic lapels.
products.detailedDescription: This knee-length trench coat features a timeless double-breasted design with a self-tie belt to accentuate your waist. Made from water-resistant polyester-cotton blend with a smooth lining. The storm flap and buttoned cuffs add sophisticated detailing.

products.title: Running Sneakers
products.description: Lightweight running shoes designed for performance and comfort.
products.detailedDescription: Engineered for runners, these sneakers feature responsive cushioning and a breathable mesh upper. The rubber outsole provides excellent traction on various surfaces. The padded collar and tongue offer enhanced comfort during long runs.

products.title: Floral Summer Dress
products.description: Bright floral dress perfect for summer outings and vacations.
products.detailedDescription: This A-line dress features a vibrant floral print on lightweight chiffon fabric. The smocked bodice and elasticated waist provide a flattering fit, while the flowy skirt offers effortless movement. Perfect for beach cover-ups or brunch dates.

products.title: Men's Hoodie
products.description: Cozy pullover hoodie with front pocket and logo print.
products.detailedDescription: This classic hoodie is made from soft cotton-polyester fleece with a brushed interior for warmth. Features a kangaroo pocket, adjustable drawstring hood, and ribbed cuffs/hem. The iconic brand logo is screen-printed on the chest.

products.title: Men's Slim Fit Denim Jacket
products.description: Classic blue denim jacket with stretch technology for comfort.
products.detailedDescription: This updated denim jacket features added stretch for enhanced mobility while maintaining the iconic Levi's look. The slim fit design sits close to the body without restricting movement. Includes chest pockets and adjustable waist tabs.

products.title: Men's Oxford Button-Down Shirt
products.description: Crisp cotton oxford shirt with button-down collar.
products.detailedDescription: Made from premium oxford cloth, this shirt features a classic button-down collar and single-needle stitching throughout. The slightly tapered fit provides a modern silhouette that works equally well with suits or jeans.

products.title: Men's Slim Fit Chinos
products.description: Stretch cotton chinos with tapered leg.
products.detailedDescription: These performance chinos combine the polished look of dress pants with the comfort of activewear. The stretch cotton fabric moves with you while resisting wrinkles. The tapered leg creates a streamlined silhouette.

products.title: Men's Running Sneakers
products.description: Lightweight running shoes with responsive cushioning.
products.detailedDescription: Engineered for speed and comfort, these running shoes feature responsive foam cushioning that absorbs impact while providing energy return. The breathable mesh upper keeps feet cool during intense workouts.

products.title: Men's Leather Belt
products.description: Genuine leather belt with polished buckle.
products.detailedDescription: Crafted from full-grain leather, this dress belt features a polished brass buckle that won't tarnish. The leather develops a rich patina over time while maintaining its strength and durability.

products.title: Men's Crewneck Sweater
products.description: Soft merino wool sweater for layering.
products.detailedDescription: This premium merino wool sweater provides exceptional warmth without bulk. The natural fibers regulate temperature and resist odors, making it ideal for travel and everyday wear.

products.title: Men's Swim Trunks
products.description: Quick-drying swim shorts with liner.
products.detailedDescription: Made from recycled materials, these sustainable swim trunks feature a quick-drying fabric that sheds water in seconds. The built-in mesh liner provides support and comfort.

products.title: Men's Aviator Sunglasses
products.description: Classic aviator style with UV protection.
products.detailedDescription: The iconic aviator design features precision-ground and polished lenses that eliminate distortion. 100% UV protection shields eyes from harmful rays while the lightweight frame ensures all-day comfort.

products.title: Men's Gym Shorts
products.description: Breathable athletic shorts with moisture-wicking fabric.
products.detailedDescription: Designed for high-intensity training, these shorts feature Under Armour's signature moisture-wicking technology that keeps you dry. The built-in liner provides support without restricting movement.

products.title: Men's Wool Coat
products.description: Warm wool overcoat for winter.
products.detailedDescription: This Italian-made wool coat features a refined silhouette with notch lapels and a half-belt back. The wool-cashmere blend provides exceptional warmth while remaining breathable.

products.title: Men's Dress Shoes
products.description: Oxford dress shoes with cushioned soles.
products.detailedDescription: These premium oxfords combine traditional styling with modern comfort technology. The cushioned insole and flexible outsole provide all-day comfort while maintaining a polished appearance.

products.title: Men's Graphic T-Shirt
products.description: Soft cotton tee with vintage band print.
products.detailedDescription: Made from premium jersey cotton, this graphic tee features a vintage-inspired print that won't crack or fade. The relaxed fit provides comfort while maintaining a stylish silhouette.

products.title: Men's Cashmere Scarf
products.description: Luxury cashmere scarf in herringbone pattern.
products.detailedDescription: Handcrafted in Scotland from 100% pure cashmere, this scarf features a traditional herringbone weave that provides exceptional warmth while remaining lightweight.

products.title: Men's Leather Wallet
products.description: Slim leather wallet with RFID protection.
products.detailedDescription: This minimalist wallet is crafted from environmentally certified leather and features RFID-blocking technology to protect your cards from digital theft.

products.title: Men's Winter Gloves
products.description: Insulated gloves with touchscreen compatibility.
products.detailedDescription: These winter gloves feature Thermolite insulation that traps body heat while allowing moisture to escape. The conductive fingertips work with touchscreens without removing the gloves.

products.title: Men's Jogger Pants
products.description: Tapered joggers with elastic cuffs.
products.detailedDescription: These performance joggers feature a tapered leg with ribbed cuffs that stay in place during activity. The moisture-wicking fabric keeps you comfortable during workouts.

products.title: Men's Baseball Cap
products.description: Structured cap with curved brim.
products.detailedDescription: This structured cap features a curved brim and adjustable strap for a custom fit. The moisture-wicking sweatband keeps you cool and comfortable.

products.title: Men's Dress Socks (3-Pack)
products.description: Premium cotton dress socks with reinforced heels.
products.detailedDescription: Engineered for comfort, these dress socks feature targeted cushioning in high-impact areas and a seamless toe to prevent irritation. For every pair purchased, Bombas donates a pair to those in need.

products.title: Men's Gym Bag
products.description: Durable duffle bag with shoe compartment.
products.detailedDescription: This spacious gym duffle features a ventilated shoe compartment to keep sweaty footwear separate from clean clothes. Made from rugged polyester that resists tears and abrasions.

products.title: Men's Watch
products.description: Water-resistant watch with leather strap.
products.detailedDescription: This classic field watch features a durable stainless steel case and genuine leather strap that develops a rich patina over time. The Indiglo backlight ensures readability in low light conditions.

products.title: Women's Wrap Dress
products.description: Flowy midi dress with tie waist and floral print.
products.detailedDescription: This sustainable wrap dress is made from Tencel lyocell that drapes beautifully while being breathable. The adjustable tie waist creates a flattering silhouette for all body types.

products.title: Women's Leather Tote
products.description: Structured genuine leather tote with interior pockets.
products.detailedDescription: Crafted from full-grain leather that softens over time, this roomy tote features interior organization including a padded laptop sleeve and multiple slip pockets for easy access to essentials.

products.title: Women's High-Waist Jeans
products.description: Vintage-inspired jeans with raw hem.
products.detailedDescription: These premium denim jeans feature a high-rise waist that smooths and supports, with a raw hem detail for an undone, modern look. The stretch fabric provides comfort without losing its shape.

products.title: Women's Ankle Boots
products.description: Suede ankle boots with block heel.
products.detailedDescription: These versatile ankle boots feature a comfortable 2-inch block heel that provides lift without sacrificing stability. The suede upper is treated for water resistance.

products.title: Women's Cashmere Sweater
products.description: Ultra-soft cashmere crewneck sweater.
products.detailedDescription: Made from 100% Mongolian cashmere, this lightweight sweater provides exceptional warmth without bulk. The relaxed fit layers beautifully while resisting pilling.

products.title: Women's Crossbody Bag
products.description: Compact crossbody with chain strap.
products.detailedDescription: This elegant crossbody features a detachable chain strap that converts to a clutch. The structured silhouette maintains its shape while providing enough room for daily essentials.

products.title: Women's Yoga Leggings
products.description: High-waisted leggings with sweat-wicking fabric.
products.detailedDescription: These performance leggings feature four-way stretch fabric that moves with your body during even the most intense workouts. The high waist provides tummy control and coverage.

products.title: Women's Silk Blouse
products.description: Flowy silk blouse with French cuffs.
products.detailedDescription: Made from 100% pure charmeuse silk, this elegant blouse drapes beautifully while the French cuffs allow for styling with cufflinks for a polished look.

products.title: Women's Wool Coat
products.description: Double-breasted wool coat with belt.
products.detailedDescription: This tailored wool coat features a notched lapel and self-tie belt that cinches at the waist for a flattering silhouette. The wool-blend fabric provides warmth without bulk.

products.title: Women's Gold Hoop Earrings
products.description: 14k gold-plated hoop earrings.
products.detailedDescription: These classic hoop earrings feature a sleek gold-plated finish that resists tarnishing. The lightweight design provides all-day comfort while adding polish to any outfit.

products.title: Women's White Sneakers
products.description: Classic leather sneakers with gum sole.
products.detailedDescription: These timeless sneakers feature a premium leather upper and distinctive gum rubber sole. The cushioned footbed provides all-day comfort while maintaining a sleek profile.

products.title: Women's Midi Skirt
products.description: Pleated midi skirt with stretch waistband.
products.detailedDescription: This elegant pleated skirt features an elasticated waistband for comfort and a midi length that hits below the knee. The fluid fabric creates beautiful movement with every step.

products.title: Women's Denim Jacket
products.description: Classic cropped denim jacket.
products.detailedDescription: This vintage-inspired denim jacket features a slightly cropped silhouette that pairs perfectly with high-waisted bottoms. The non-stretch denim softens beautifully with wear.

products.title: Women's Silk Scarf
products.description: Signature silk twill scarf.
products.detailedDescription: This iconic 90cm square scarf is crafted from 100% silk twill and features hand-rolled edges. The vibrant print is created using up to 45 different screens for exceptional color depth.

products.title: Women's Bralette
products.description: Lace bralette with adjustable straps.
products.detailedDescription: This wireless bralette provides light support with its stretchy lace fabric and adjustable straps. The soft elastic band prevents digging while the seamless design remains invisible under clothing.

products.title: Women's Leather Belt
products.description: Slim leather belt with signature buckle.
products.detailedDescription: This 1/2" wide belt features Coach's signature turnlock buckle and is crafted from supple glove-tanned leather that develops a rich patina over time. The five hole adjustment ensures a perfect fit.

products.title: Women's Wide-Leg Pants
products.description: High-waisted linen blend pants.
products.detailedDescription: These breezy wide-leg pants feature a high-rise waist that elongates the legs and a linen-blend fabric that resists wrinkling while remaining breathable. The side pockets add functionality.

products.title: Women's Straw Hat
products.description: Wide-brim straw hat with black band.
products.detailedDescription: This stylish sun hat features a 3" brim that provides UPF 50+ sun protection. The natural straw is handwoven and the interior sweatband ensures comfortable all-day wear.

products.title: Women's Turtleneck Sweater
products.description: Fine-knit merino wool turtleneck.
products.detailedDescription: This lightweight merino wool sweater features a snug turtleneck collar that provides extra warmth without bulk. The fine gauge knit creates a polished look that layers beautifully under jackets.

products.title: Women's Leather Backpack
products.description: Compact leather backpack with laptop sleeve.
products.detailedDescription: This versatile backpack features vegetable-tanned leather that develops a unique patina over time. The padded 15" laptop compartment and multiple pockets keep essentials organized.

products.title: Kids' Dinosaur Hoodie
products.description: Cozy cotton hoodie with dinosaur embroidery.
products.detailedDescription: This playful hoodie features a soft cotton fleece interior and embroidered dinosaur design that withstands repeated washing. The kangaroo pocket keeps little hands warm.

products.title: Kids' Light-Up Sneakers
products.description: Fun sneakers that light up when walking.
products.detailedDescription: These exciting sneakers feature LED lights in the soles that activate with each step. The memory foam insoles provide cushioning while the hook-and-loop closure makes them easy to put on.

products.title: Kids' Cartoon T-Shirt
products.description: Cotton tee with favorite character print.
products.detailedDescription: Made from super-soft 100% cotton jersey, this tee features vibrant character graphics that resist cracking or fading. The tagless label prevents irritation on sensitive skin.

products.title: Kids' Jogger Pants
products.description: Soft joggers with elastic waistband.
products.detailedDescription: These comfortable joggers feature an elastic waistband with an adjustable drawstring for the perfect fit. The tapered legs with ribbed cuffs stay in place during active play.

products.title: Kids' Backpack
products.description: Personalizable backpack with lunch box.
products.detailedDescription: This durable backpack features a roomy main compartment and matching lunch box. The wipe-clean lining resists spills while the padded straps provide comfort.

products.title: Kids' Pajama Set
products.description: Organic cotton PJ set with fun print.
products.detailedDescription: Made from GOTS-certified organic cotton, these pajamas feature playful prints and are free from harmful chemicals. The elastic waistband and cuffs provide comfort all night.

products.title: Kids' Winter Coat
products.description: Water-resistant puffer coat with hood.
products.detailedDescription: This warm winter coat features Omni-Tech waterproof technology and thermal-reflective lining. The adjustable hood and cuffs help seal out cold air.

products.title: Kids' Baseball Cap
products.description: Adjustable cap with velcro closure.
products.detailedDescription: This durable kids' cap features an adjustable velcro strap for a perfect fit as they grow. The structured front panel maintains its shape while the breathable fabric keeps them cool during play.

products.title: Kids' Swim Trunks
products.description: Quick-dry swim trunks with mesh liner.
products.detailedDescription: These performance swim trunks feature UPF 50+ sun protection and a built-in mesh liner for comfort. The quick-dry fabric sheds water quickly after swimming.

products.title: Kids' Hair Accessories
products.description: Assorted hair clips and bows.
products.detailedDescription: This 15-piece set includes colorful hair clips, bows and elastics in various styles. All pieces are nickel-free and safe for sensitive skin.

products.title: Classic White Sneakers
products.description: Iconic leather sneakers with gum sole.
products.detailedDescription: These timeless sneakers feature a premium leather upper and distinctive gum rubber sole. The cushioned footbed provides all-day comfort while maintaining a sleek profile.

products.title: Canvas Backpack
products.description: Durable backpack with laptop sleeve.
products.detailedDescription: This classic backpack features a padded 15" laptop sleeve and signature striped liner. The adjustable shoulder straps and airmesh back padding provide comfortable carrying.

products.title: Beanie Hat
products.description: Warm acrylic knit beanie.
products.detailedDescription: This durable beanie features a rib-knit design that stretches for a comfortable fit. The acrylic yarn provides warmth without itchiness.

products.title: Cotton Socks (3-Pack)
products.description: Breathable socks with cushioned soles.
products.detailedDescription: These premium socks feature honeycomb arch support and seamless toes to prevent irritation. For every pair purchased, Bombas donates a pair to those in need.

products.title: Hooded Rain Jacket
products.description: Water-resistant jacket with sealed seams.
products.detailedDescription: This lightweight jacket features DryVent 2L fabric that provides waterproof protection while remaining breathable. The adjustable hood and cuffs help seal out wind and rain.

products.title: Sunglasses
products.description: UV-protection sunglasses with polarized lenses.
products.detailedDescription: These stylish sunglasses feature 100% UV protection and polarized lenses that reduce glare. The lightweight acetate frame provides all-day comfort.

products.title: Gym Water Bottle
products.description: Insulated stainless steel water bottle.
products.detailedDescription: This vacuum-insulated bottle keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours or hot for up to 12 hours. The powder-coated exterior resists condensation and slips.

products.title: Fleece Blanket
products.description: Soft fleece throw blanket.
products.detailedDescription: This plush fleece blanket features a traditional Native American-inspired pattern. The double-sided design provides warmth while remaining lightweight.

products.title: Canvas Tote Bag
products.description: Reusable shopping tote with reinforced handles.
products.detailedDescription: This sturdy tote holds up to 50 pounds and folds into its own pocket for easy storage. The reinforced handles distribute weight comfortably.

products.title: Wool Scarf
products.description: Warm wool scarf in plaid pattern.
products.detailedDescription: This wool-blend scarf features traditional Native American-inspired patterns. The fringed edges add a classic touch while the generous length allows for versatile styling.
